SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id

update sys_check_business
config_id = #{configId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
operatio_name = #{operatioName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
arraignment_time = #{arraignmentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
arraignment_people = #{arraignmentPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
arraignment_people_id = #{arraignmentPeopleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

revoke_cause = #{revokeCause,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

modify_time = sysdate()
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
